text: Dharmikata tate naya ye tomadera mukha puba ba pascima dike phera'o, tabe dharmanistha hacche ye allahara prati imana ane, ara akheratera dinera prati, ara phirisâ€Œtadera prati, ara granthakhanite, ara nabidera prati; ara ye tamra prati mahabbata basatah dhana dana kare aâ€Œtmiya-sbajanadera, ara etimadera, ara misakinadera, ara pathacaridera, ara bhikharidera, ara dasadera muktipana babada, ara ye namaya kayema kare o yakata adaya kareca ara yara pratijna karara pare tadera oyada raksa kare, ara abhaba-anatane o apatkale o atankera samaye dhairyasiladera. Era'i tara yara satyanistha, ara era nijera'i dharmaparayana.
